• About

  • Basic Information

  • Interests

My name is Dimosthenis Theocharis. I am currently undergraduate of the Department of Informatics of Thessaloniki and i work as a Software Engineer using web technologies. In university i learn about important concepts of software engineering and in my job i try to apply these concepts and tactics and get my hand dirty with popular & modern languages, frameworks and tools.

In the future, i would like to study topics such as Artificial Intelligence, maybe Data Science and use them to build cool projects. I also intend to gain general knowledge such as linux, agile, devops etc in order to complete the package of 'Software Engineer'. I believe in the motto "Hard work pays off"
